nodes.text: The Deluxe Undersea Package was a package holiday advertised and sold by the Star Tours travel agency by the year 4.3 ABY to the luxurious Sea Castle Resort Hotel on the planet Praya, a submarine hotel that was rated five stars by the Milky Way Guide. It had an accomplished staff and deep sea food was a specially. Activities included exploring the serene ocean in a marine speeder from Sea Base 2000 and encountering rare water creatures, as well as hunting for treasure in sunken ships.
The Deluxe Undersea Package was first mentioned in Tokyo Disneyland's simulator ride theme park attraction Star Tours, which opened on July 12, 1989.
